metaTags.metaDescription: The latest security innovation content providing insights for the digital enterprise.

proactivePopup.subHeadingText: Learn how tech leaders are integrating AI into apps, securing complex networks, and more.

ctaButton.elementName: theNET - Tackling digital modernization: Leadership perspectives - Digital magazine - Button

relatedBlades.title: Navigating data localization and compliance
relatedBlades.copy: The GDPR has triggered numerous regulatory actions based on the dubious idea that localizing data makes it more private and secure — Organizations need ways to meet localization obligations without impacting user experiences. The best solutions will focus on how to safeguard data more than where to do so.

contentfulAsset.description: Pursuing privacy security  image

features.title: Addressing technical debt
features.description: Many IT teams today use more than 20 solutions to secure their organization — leaving gaps in protection while slowing strategic initiatives. Adopting an integrated platform can close security gaps and reduce complexity

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Addressing technical debt- Image

features.title: Building resilient networks for AI applications
features.description: The rise of AI-powered, cloud-delivered applications is driving the need to enhance network reliability and security — converging networking and security can help you build more powerful AI models and deploy innovative AI applications everywhere

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Building resilient networks for AI applications - Image

features.title: Digital transformation in banking
features.description: From cloud and mobile to blockchain and AI, new technologies are reshaping banking — creating unexpected security vulnerabilities. Banks must implement robust, multi-layered security capabilities to reduce cyber risks and avoid data breaches

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Digital transformation in banking - Image

features.title: Connecting and protecting everything
features.description: Today's network architectures aren't designed for our era of connectivity. We need to reimagine the network with the connectivity cloud

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation - John Engates - Image

features.title: Five ways to build a successful cyber security team
features.description: A service-oriented mindset can help cyber security leaders deliver greater value to the business. Paul Farley, Deputy CISO of NCR Voyix, shares best practices for people-first leadership

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Five ways to build a successful cyber security team - Image

features.title: A roadmap to Zero Trust adoption
features.description: Adopting Zero Trust security is widely recognized as a complex journey, but getting started doesn't have to be — here are 5 Zero Trust adoption projects that require comparatively little effort

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation - Roadmap to Zero Trust - Image

features.title: A nonprofit playbook for technology transformation
features.description: 67% of nonprofits are increasing their investment in technology to better engage constituents — Mark Coffey, Head of Technology Transformation at Irish Cancer Society, shares how he has leveraged digital modernization to improve human experiences

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - A nonprofit playbook for technology transformation - Image

features.title: Balancing privacy and business risk
features.description: Deep dive into the risks and costs of underinvesting in security, and how security and privacy leaders can be powerful partners in convincing their organizations why investments in security are so important

features.title: New realities of data in a digitally modern world
features.description: New digital environments mean data can be anywhere, an evolution that has chipped away at the compliance and security measures organizations have in place — In this article, we explore the who, what, and where of data management

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - New realities of data in a digitally modern world - Image

features.title: Keeping healthcare cyber resilient
features.description: Healthcare is one of the most targeted industries — Here are 5 best practices to keep hospital staff, administration, and operations cyber resilient

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Keeping healthcare cyber resilient - Image

features.title: Reducing the cost of consolidation
features.description: Many 'platforms' have underdelivered on lowering TCO — here are 4 qualities that CISOs can use to evaluate platforms for consolidation and gain real cost benefits

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Reducing the cost of consolidation - Image

features.title: Securing the sales organization
features.description: Empowering Sales is critical to most businesses because it drives revenue — A challenge if we rely on VPNs and other legacy security tools. Fortunately, there is a way to balance the needs of Sales and Security

features.title: Pursuing privacy-first security
features.description: Data privacy has been elevated as a matter of importance to mitigating risk — now more than ever, CISOs must collaborate with their CPOs to implement a privacy-first security program

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Pursuing privacy-first security - Image

features.title: Redefining cyber security with Zero Trust
features.description: The scope of cyber security has extended far beyond fundamental protection — Gartner predicts that by 2025, 60% of companies will use Zero Trust to help navigate IT complexity

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Redefining cyber security with Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Any-to-any connectivity for business
features.description: Connecting the corporate network has become a challenge for organizations dealing with vendor sprawl. A connectivity cloud eliminates networking complexity and addresses diverse networking needs

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - Security Innovation -Any-to-any connectivity for business - Image

features.title: Securing the healthcare ecosystem
features.description: Over 100 million people were affected by cyber attacks in the healthcare industry last year — 5 strategies that keep healthcare cyber resilient

features.title: The business case for Zero Trust
features.description: Zero Trust enables continuous monitoring and validation for a workforce that is often the first and last line of defense when dealing with cyber threats

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - The business case for Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Staying ahead of scammers
features.description: The "human element" is still a factor in 3 out of every 4 breaches. Daragh Mahon, CIO of Werner Enterprises discusses how to balance training, penetration testing, and solutions to stay ahead

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Staying ahead of scammers - Image

features.title: Elevating organizational trust with Zero Trust
features.description: Security is at the heart of consumer trust — In an era where data breaches and cyber attacks are both pervasive and prevalent, organizations need a proactive and comprehensive security strategy

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Elevating organizational trust with Zero Trust - Image

features.title: Security without stagnation
features.description: I make room for mentoring because I believe it serves a greater good and helps drive continuous innovation in cyber security. Here are 3 questions CSO's should ask before embarking on a mentorship relationship

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Security without stagnation: What I've learned from mentoring startups - Image

features.title: Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud
features.description: Security has gone from being responsible for one technological domain — the on-prem environment — to many others, causing a loss in visibility and control

imageAssetFile.title: theNET - CxO Digital Magazine - Security Innovation - Regain control of IT with the connectivity cloud - Image

features.title: Regain control of complex network environments
features.description: Vendor consolidation does not mean giving up flexibility or scalability. You can implement a connected, composable platform that has flexibility for change and the scalability to expand as your networks expand
